Patrick McHenry Explains FIT21's Passage https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/06/19/patrick-mchenry-explains-fit21s-passage/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines NRGAUEGBBZABJPYHZAUYJOPDDU Nikhilesh DeCongressman Patrick McHenry (R-N.C.) chairs the powerful House Financial Services Committee, and has been the leading Republican on the panel for years. Last year, he spent a few weeks as the Speaker Pro Tempore of the House of Representatives, after lawmakers voted to oust then-speaker Kevin McCarthy (R-Calif.). McHenry announced his retirement in December and will leave office when his term expires this coming January. He spoke virtually at Consensus 2024 in Austin at the end of May.
